explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the application of machine learning (ML) techniques to improve the Monarch Butterfly Optimization (MBO) algorithm.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper introduces clustering, which is a technique commonly associated with unsupervised learning, into the MBO algorithm.
explanations.clustering: The paper specifically uses k-means clustering to divide the population into subpopulations in the proposed CBMBO algorithm.
